pages.title: OpenComputers
pages.text: OpenComputers is a ComputerCraft complimentary mod which adds more advanced computers that can be programed with Lua. Alongside Computronics, both mods are bridged.$(br2)$(l:https://ocdoc.cil.li/)OpenComputers Wiki$(/l)$(br2)$(l:https://oc.cil.li/forum/34-programs/)Community made programs$(/l)

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: OpenComputers can be learned either from the ingame manual or the online documentation, both are as equally useful. Computronics information can be found in the manual.$(br2)Recipe to craft another manual is on the next page if you happen to lose it.
Crafting a new manual is unfortunately a little expensive. You will need a microchip which requires a transistor to make it.
